==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|jm}}, {{l|de|jhm}}, {{l|de|ym}}, {{l|de|yhm}} {{qual|Early New High German}} * {{l|de|ihme}} {{qual|obsolete}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{qualifier|standard}} {{IPA|de|/iːm/}} :* {{audio|de|De-ihm.ogg|audio}} :* {{rhymes|de|iːm}} * {{qualifier|colloquially in unstressed position}} {{IPA|de|/əm/}} ===Pronoun=== {{head|de|pronoun forms}} # {{lb|de|personal}} {{inflection of|de|er||dat}}, [[him]]; [[to]] [[him]] (''indirect object''); (''in some cases'') [[for]] him. #: {{ux|de|Könntest du '''ihm''' deinen Stift geben?|Could you give '''him''' your pen?}} #: {{ux|de|Schnell! Gib '''ihm''' das!|Quickly! Give this '''to him'''!}} # {{lb|de|personal}} {{inflection of|de|es||dat}}, [[it]]; [[to]] [[it]] (''indirect object''); (''in some cases'') [[for]] it. ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:German personal pronouns]] ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/iːm/}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|hrx|gmh|him}}, from {{inh|hrx|goh|himo}}, from {{inh|hrx|gem-pro|*himmai}}. ===Pronoun=== {{head|hrx|pronoun}} # stressed dative of [[er]]. # stressed dative of [[es]]. ====Inflection==== {{hrx-decl-personal pronouns}} ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary]
